Some observations upon the tickling querie (viz.) whether the admitting of a popish successor be the best way to preserve the Protestant religion, with other passages touching the history of the succession and other pamphlets / by a gentleman in the countrey to his friend in London. Gentleman in the countrey.
[2], 7 p.
Printed for Joanna Brome ..., London : 1681.
Reproduction of original in University of Pennsylvania Library.
